mutants.code:
from collections import OrderedDict, Counter

def calculate_net_prices(items):
    report = type('OC', (OrderedDict, Counter), {})()
    for item in items:
        (article, price) = item.rsplit(' ', 1)
        report[article] -= int(price)
    return report

from collections import OrderedDict, Counter

def calculate_net_prices(items):
    report = type('', (OrderedDict, Counter), {})()
    for item in items:
        (article, price) = item.rsplit(' ', 1)
        report[article] += int(price)
    return report

from collections import OrderedDict, Counter

def calculate_net_prices(items):
    report = type('OC', (OrderedDict, Counter), {})()
    for item in items:
        (article, price) = item.rsplit(' ', -1)
        report[article] += int(price)
    return report
